name: Renewable energy facility siting special fund; uses
text:
(a)  There is created within the state treasury a renewable energy facility siting special fund, which shall consist of:
     (1)  Moneys appropriated to the fund by the legislature;
     (2)  Permit plan application fees collected by the coordinator under this chapter; and
     (3)  Moneys allotted to the fund from other sources.
     (b)  Moneys from the fund shall be expended by the energy resources coordinator for the purposes of section 201N-4(a) and for the operation and administration of the renewable energy facility siting process pursuant to this chapter. [L 2008, c 207, pt of §2]
